verbose_text: We found that rapamycin treatment promoted the interaction between CRTC2 and CREB (XREF_FIG), induced CREB binding to the cox-2 promoter, and enhanced luciferase activity of the cox-2 promoter (XREF_FIG) in preadipocytes.
evidence: CRTC2 and CREB ( XREF_FIG ), induced CREB binding to the cox-2 promoter                                              , and enhanced luciferase activity of the cox-2
